solution_line_template: The four cats weigh {total_weight} pounds in total because {cat1_weight} plus {cat2_weight} plus {cat3_weight} plus {cat4_weight} equals <<{cat1_weight}+{cat2_weight}+{cat3_weight}+{cat4_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight}.
The average weight is {average_weight} pounds because {total_weight} divided by {num_cats} is <<{total_weight}/{num_cats}={average_weight}>>{average_weight}.
